description: Prescriptive Machine Learning framework for analyzing Aadhaar service delivery.
From-scratch implementations of core concepts in machine learning, math, and programming. No frameworks unless necessary  just fundamentals, step by step.
Developing an automated credit risk management framework, integrating high-performance machine learning and an algorithmic bias control mechanism.
A machine learning framework for predicting specific wear rate and coefficient of friction in fiber-reinforced composite tribology systems using experimental operating parameters.
A curated list of awesome Machine Learning frameworks, libraries and software. With repository stars and forks

A novel hybrid machine learning framework combining LSTM and Random Forest models to predict international student academic success with cultural adaptation modeling and early risk detection (Week 8-12).

This project is a Smart Home Energy Saving application designed to optimize energy consumption in smart homes. It is built using a combination of machine learning models and generative AI, leveraging a multi-agent framework (Microsoft Agent Framework).
Machine learning framework for identifying high-energy coastal event deposits (Ph.D. Thesis Research).
Interactive assessment framework for scoping AI, machine learning and data science projects for social good organizations.
In Silico Prediction of Shelf-Life for Marinated Meat Products Using an Integrative Framework of Machine Learning and Text Mining

Validation-driven machine learning framework where scientific constraints act as adaptive validators rather than fixed physics losses. Demonstrated on a climate downscaling example to contrast against PINN-style constraint enforcement
dgbpy is a framework for research and deployment of machine learning models from seismic and well data.

A machine learning-based system for detecting fraudulent financial transactions. This project analyzes transaction patterns, builds predictive models, and identifies anomalies with high accuracy while minimizing false positives, providing a research-driven framework for financial fraud detection

A curated list of awesome frameworks, libraries, tools, and resources for Artificial Intelligence (AI). This list covers everything from foundational machine learning and deep learning to specialized areas like NLP, computer vision, and AI ethics.
Machine learning evaluation frameworks

A collection of machine learning projects and experiments covering end-to-end ML pipelines, from model development to deployment. Focused on practical AI engineering, ML frameworks and MLOps practices.
Creating a framework to run Machine Learning and Neural Network
A machine learning framework in Zig.

In finance, risk management has overseen a wide variety of implementations involving machine learning. In recent times, deep learning has become especially prominent in this branch. I investigate a recent paper published in 2025 proposing a hybrid LSTM-CNN framework for risk management, performing lit. review, replication, and extensions.
Cost-aware option hedging using a two-stage machine learning control framework
Machinelearning driven short-selling and portfolio backtesting framework for OMXS30, with an interactive Dash dashboard.
A simple miniature Deep learning framework demonstrating insides of machine learning frameworks
Decentralized machine learning framework
Machine-learning framework for predicting phenotypic traits in Metschnikowia pulcherrima

Mapping Alternate Scenarios of Forest Intactness (MASFI) is a cloud-based machine learning framework. It uses XGBoost regression and remote sensing data such as GEDI LiDAR to create high-resolution maps and statistics, supporting protected area planning and management.

This is the first release of the Variational Spectral Learning code (reference implementation) used to generate the figures/analyses in the manuscript titled "Variational (Energy-Based) Spectral Learning: A Machine Learning Framework for Solving Partial Differential Equations".
A Dual-Pipeline Machine Learning Framework for Automated Sleep Disorder Screening using Hybrid Resampling and Ensemble Learning.
A machine learning framework classifying smoker status via bio-signals, benchmarking Random Forest against baseline models with 5-fold cross-validation.

VeriCredit is an enterprise-grade AI governance framework designed to evaluate, validate, and audit AI-generated credit decision explanations produced by Large Language Models (LLMs). The system ensures that credit explanations are faithful to underlying machine learning models, free from bias, legally compliant, and stable across prompts.
multiple machine learning and deep learning practice projects and framework practice repo
MLForge is a production-grade Machine Learning & MLOps framework for building, training, testing, deploying, and monitoring ML systems end-to-end.

This project implements a market-neutral quantitative equity trading model using daily price data from Indian large-cap stocks. The strategy combines multiple systematic alpha signalsmean reversion, momentum, statistical arbitrage, and machine learningwithin a longshort framework. Risk is controlled using volatility-based position sizing and ATR
Attempt at Porting LTX-2 Video Model to Apple's MLX Machine Learning Framework
A comprehensive machine learning framework for quantitative trading strategies

Auditron is an open-source Python evaluation and testing framework for AI and machine-learning systems. It supports traditional ML workflows and modern AI systems, including LLMs and document-based pipelines, to automatically detect risks and quality issues before deployment, enabling safer, fairer, and more reliable AI models.

This repository contains an AI-driven fake news detection project using multiple machine learning models across three datasets (CIC Truth Seeker, MC_Fake, and WELFake). The project follows the KDD framework and applies explainable AI techniques (LIME and SHAP) to improve transparency and interpretability of model predictions.

In competitive industries like telecoms, retaining customers is as vital as gaining them. Using real-world data, this churn research project analyzes why users leave and how to stop it. By leveraging machine learning and predictive modeling, I translate data into business strategies, creating a framework to maintain an engaged, loyal customer base.

The Extreme Gradient Boosting (XGB) model exhibited the best predictive performance on the testing set.  In this work, we proposed a machine learning framework to predict the f values of ABO4-type ceramics.

SpectralInsight is an advanced machine learning framework for spectral data analysis, implementing PCA (Principal Component Analysis) and LDA (Linear Discriminant Analysis) dimensionality reduction techniques combined with KNN (K-Nearest Neighbors) classification to evaluate classification performance across different dimensional spaces.
Machine learning framework for discovering potentially habitable exoplanets using astrophysical data, feature engineering, and ensemble models.
VocalNeuro AI is a high-precision Machine Learning diagnostic framework designed to identify Parkinson's Disease (PD) through high-dimensional acoustic analysis.
Reproducible Machine Learning Framework for Student Placement Prediction

CTVAM (Cybersecurity Threat & Vulnerability Analysis Model) is a modular framework for ingesting NVD CVE data, preprocessing vulnerability metrics, performing feature engineering, generating analytics, and applying machine-learning models for severity prediction and risk insights.

A .NET Core application for house price prediction using machine learning.  Built with ASP.NET Core, Entity Framework Core, and ML.NET.  Features RESTful API, data validation, and comprehensive testing.
MULTI-evolve: a machine learning-guided end-to-end framework for engineering hyperactive multi-mutant proteins

This repository contains all the necessary supplimentary data of our research work: "Toward a Glass-Box Framework: Interpretable and Statistically Validated Machine Learning for Geopolymer Concrete Strength Prediction"

Developed a machine learning-based resume parser with 86% accuracy, utilizing spaCy, Named Entity Recognition (NER) and BERT framework to extract resume information, and designed a user-friendly web interface.
This repository includes all the code developed during my in-depth exploration of machine learning and deep learning frameworks.
Node.js bindings for [MLX](https://github.com/ml-explore/mlx) - Apple's array framework for machine learning on Apple Silicon.
An All-in-One Algo-Trading Framework: Backtest -> Train -> Trade -> Monitor. Machine / Deep Learning Ready. Supports All Trading: TradFi+CeFi+DeFi. Code Once, Trade Anywhere.

Atlas DataFlow  um framework contrato-driven para construo de pipelines analticos modulares, auditveis e adaptveis. Organiza o fluxo de dados em etapas orientadas a domnio, promovendo rastreabilidade, reprodutibilidade e integrao consistente entre anlise de dados, modelagem estatstica e aplicaes de machine learning.
Machine learning framework for modeling glacier surface mass balance (SMB) and surface energy balance (SEB) using COSIPY output and ERA5-Land..

A curated list of awesome Machine Learning frameworks, libraries and software.
A machine learningdriven framework to analyze and classify internal migration patterns in India using Aadhaar address update data.
Machine learning, computer vision, statistics and general scientific computing for .NET

Heart disease classification project using a dataset of 920 patient records. Evaluates ML and deep learning models including Logistic Regression, SVM, Random Forest, XGBoost, LightGBM, CatBoost, and TabNet. CatBoost achieved the best results, with SHAP analysis used to interpret key clinical features.

This repository contains the code and simulation framework used in the paper:      Comparing Optimal Transport and Machine Learning Approaches for Data Merging Under Missing Covariate Scenarios: Application to Clinical Research
TAK-ML - A machine learning framework for use with the TAK ecosystem (specifically ATAK and TAK Server at the moment)
A Machine Learning framework for predicting post-silicon power and timing metrics based on PVT variations.

Machine learning framework for calibrating low-cost PurpleAir temperature sensors. Achieves 0.380.53C accuracy (3251% improvement over uncalibrated data) using gradient boosting. Tested across 31 U.S. states. Enables accurate hyperlocal heat monitoring for health research and environmental justice applications.

LifePulse is a high-precision machine learning application designed to assist in the early detection of heart disease. Built on a TensorFlow/Keras framework, the core model is a Multi-Layer Artificial Neural Network (ANN) that analyzes 13 critical clinical biomarkers including chest pain type, ST depression, and thallium stress test results.
An open-source framework for machine learning and other computations on decentralized data.

A comprehensive Python framework for designing, backtesting, and evaluating quantitative trading strategies. This project demonstrates skills in Data Science, Machine Learning, and Financial Engineering.
chemtrain-deploy: A parallel and scalable framework for machine learning potentials in million-atom MD simulations
This repository contains the supplementary materials for the paper: Machine Learning Framework for Speech Intelligibility Prediction using Binaural Room Impulse Responses (Alfian et al., 2026)

Hi, I am Azka Muzaki, I am a dedicated with a passion for Machine Learning and AI, I have worked on various projects involving the development of Machine Learning, Deep Learning. I have strong skills in programming languages such as Python and C++, and am familiar with frameworks such as PyTorch & Tensorflow

Genetic algorithmbased inverse design framework for discovering double perovskite oxides with target band gaps for photovoltaic applications. Integrates DFT-informed machine learning as a fast surrogate and validates top candidates using first-principles DFT calculations.

This project is a Machine Learning web application built using Streamlit that predicts the species of an Iris flower based on user-provided measurements.  The application demonstrates how a trained ML model can be quickly deployed as an interactive web app using pure Python, without any frontend frameworks.
A curated list of tools, frameworks, platforms, and resources for Machine Learning Operations (MLOps).
Disease prediction framework based on machine learning using metabolomics data
Hyrax - A framework for machine learning in astronomy

This project focuses on customer behavior analysis using the RFMT framework combined with machine learning techniques. It segments customers into meaningful groups to help organizations optimize marketing strategies and enhance customer relationships.
Real-time Federated Data Platform Harnessing Machine Learning for Adaptive Intelligent Workflow Optimization Framework
Comprehensive Tunneling Performance Analytics - ML framework for MTBM optimization with 90%+ accuracy, 50+ SQL queries, Power BI dashboards |          Python, scikit-learn, SQL"

A neural network that analyzes a toy data set of heights and weights, mapping them to genders. This was done without the help of machine learning frameworks to deeply understand how a neural network learns.

End-to-end fraud decisioning and risk scoring framework for credit card transactions, combining machine learning, behavioral risk signals, and operational decision thresholds (approve / review / decline).
The PennyLane-Qulacs plugin integrates the Qulacs quantum computing framework with PennyLane's quantum machine learning capabilities.

Machine learning framework to predict ICU and hospital length of stay in infants with congenital heart disease undergoing cardiac surgery. Combines representation learning (MKL), clustering, and local models to provide interpretable, personalized predictions from perioperative data.

HackGPT Enterprise is a production-ready, cloud-native AI-powered penetration testing platform designed for enterprise security teams. It combines advanced AI, machine learning, microservices architecture, and comprehensive security frameworks to deliver professional-grade cybersecurity assessments.

A robust framework for Detecting and Anonymizing Personally Identifiable Information (PII) in Financial Documents using hybrid rule-based Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing based techniques.
Framework for building AI agents with real-time adaptive learning capabilities.
Python SHIELD Machine Learning Framework - is a custom framework for AI/ML development compatible with Cuda, XPU and CPU. It also supports DDP.
Predict football match outcomes using the W-5 Multi-Agent AI Consensus Framework, achieving high accuracy with a blend of AI and machine learning techniques.

Python-based multi-stage framework for daily rainfall time-series reconstruction in seasonal tropical forest ecosystems using unsupervised anomaly detection, bias-corrected reanalysis and satellite data, and multi-objective machine learning selection.
A Spring-based AI/ML framework for building intelligent applications,  providing a solid foundation for machine learning, NLP, CV, and more.
Fuzzy machine learning framework
An Open Source Machine Learning Framework for Everyone

BioGraphX is a comprehensive framework for extracting biophysical features from protein sequences using graph-theoretical approaches. The system models proteins as interaction networks where residues form nodes and biochemical interactions form edges, enabling sophisticated feature extraction for downstream machine learning applications

A custom machine learning framework built from scratch in C while learning core AI and ML concepts. Implements data processing, encoding, mathematical operations, and model logic without third-party or prebuilt ML libraries. Focused on low-level understanding, memory management, performance optimization, and scalable ML systems.

An end-to-end machine learning research and experimentation framework for Forex market prediction, signal generation (BUY / SELL / HOLD), and performance evaluation using feature engineering, ensemble learning, and time-series modeling.

Proposed an automated framework combining machine vision and machine learning to assess cognitive biases in decision-making. Eye-tracking, facial expressions, and behavioral data were used to model risk tendencies. Results revealed distinct bias patterns across risk groups, supporting data-driven decision analysis.

A machine learning based and data-driven methodological framework to predict the generation quantity of HW at the firm-level in every month through linking different datasets across domains, which were used as proxies to indicate both static characteristics and real-time activities of enterprises.
Machine learning framework for real-time cancer risk prediction with adaptive self-training feedback.

brpc is an Industrial-grade RPC framework using C++ Language, which is often used in high performance system such as Search, Storage, Machine learning, Advertisement, Recommendation etc. "brpc" means "better RPC".
A general-purpose, config-driven machine learning framework for supervised learning on tabular datasets. Perfect for Kaggle competitions, local experiments, and rapid ML prototyping.
A comprehensive collection of machine learning algorithms and deep learning models implemented from scratch and using modern frameworks.
